services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional cleaning solutions tailored to your needs

automotive.title: Engine Bay Cleaning
automotive.subtitle: Automotive Cleaning
automotive.description: Professional dry ice cleaning for automotive engine bays, removing grease, oil, and carbon buildup without damaging sensitive electrical components. Safe, effective, and environmentally friendly.

industrial.title: Heavy Machinery
industrial.subtitle: Industrial Equipment Cleaning
industrial.description: Heavy-duty dry ice cleaning for industrial machinery and equipment. Removes tough contaminants, paint, rust, and buildup from manufacturing equipment, welding fixtures, and production lines.
industrial.imageAlt: Industrial equipment and heavy machinery cleaning

residential.title: Home Services
residential.subtitle: Residential Cleaning
residential.description: Specialized dry ice cleaning services for residential applications including mold remediation, fire damage restoration, and delicate surface cleaning. Coming soon to serve homeowners.

restoration.title: Restoration Services
restoration.subtitle: Heritage & Artwork Cleaning
restoration.description: Specialized cleaning for restoration and heritage projects including historical buildings, artwork, and delicate antique surfaces requiring gentle yet effective cleaning methods.

hero.title: About GlaciX
hero.subtitle: Leading the future of eco-friendly cleaning with innovative dry ice technology. We transform the way businesses approach industrial and automotive cleaning.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in Copenhagen, GlaciX emerged from a simple vision: revolutionize cleaning processes while protecting our environment. What started as a small team of engineers passionate about sustainable technology has grown into Denmark's leading dry ice cleaning service.
story.paragraph2: We specialize in automotive engine bay cleaning, heavy machinery maintenance, and residential services. Our chemical-free approach not only delivers superior results but also ensures the safety of your equipment and the environment.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to serve hundreds of satisfied customers across Denmark, from individual car enthusiasts to large industrial operations.

whyDryIce.title: Why Dry Ice Cleaning?
whyDryIce.description: Dry ice cleaning uses solid COâ‚‚ pellets that sublimate on contact, leaving no residue. It's the most environmentally friendly cleaning method available today - no chemicals, no water damage, just pristine results.

values.title: What Sets Us Apart
values.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence goes beyond just cleaning. We deliver value through innovation, sustainability, and unmatched customer service.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: 100% chemical-free cleaning process that's safe for the environment and your equipment.

fastEfficient.title: Fast & Efficient
fastEfficient.description: Quick turnaround times without compromising on quality. Most services completed within 2 hours.

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: Certified technicians with years of experience in dry ice cleaning technology.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.description: Our certified technicians bring years of experience and passion for innovation. Every team member is trained in the latest dry ice cleaning techniques and safety protocols.
